1427450.name: Dino Drink
1427450.description:
“Dino Drink” is an exciting and colorful four-player board game where each player takes on the role of a colorful T-Rex. The objective of the game is to be the first to cross the finish line, using strategy, luck and special skills to overcome your opponents.

Players move their T-Rex across the board, collecting skill boxes that grant them special powers. The available skills are:

-Speed: Allows your T-Rex to move faster across the board.

-Fireball: Gives your T-Rex the ability to launch a fireball at an opponent.

-Teleport: Allows your T-Rex to swap places with a random player.

-Traction Weapon: Allows your T-Rex to pull another player back.
(New skills coming with future updates)

It is possible to play using physical dice and manually operate the movement of each player on the board
Or you can simply use the game's virtual dice.

But be careful! The game also includes a drinking element. In each round,
the game randomly selects a player who must drink.



“Dino Drink” is a fun and exciting board game that combines strategy,
luck and laughter. Whether you're a fan of dinosaurs, board games, or just looking for a fun new way to cheer up
game night, “Dino Drink” is the game for you!
